additionalInfo.description:
In Type 2 Slowly Changing Dimension , for new or changed record a new record is added as insert to the dimension to represent the new information. The old version of the changed record is updated to reset its validity date and its status. This allows all historical information to be accurately preserved.

(Check in #1)
Required fields in the slowly changing dimension:
1. Surrogate key - numeric field of integer or bigint data type
2. Set of fields (or a single field) that represents the unique record identifier or the primary key of the source object
3. VALID_FROM - must have exact same name. Represents the record validity start datetime. The starting value is 1900/01/01
4. VALID_TO - must have exact same name. Represents the record validity end datetime. For the most current record, the value is set to 2099/12/31
5. CURRENT_FLAG - must have exact same name. Represents the record status.  Y if this is the most recent version; N - historical version
6. CRC_NUM - must have exact same name. Cyclic Redundancy Check number used to detect the changes

NOTE: Multiple instances of the target connection and the target object are necessary to implement different target field map rules:
• insert a new record
• insert a new version of the existing record
• update the outdated record status and validity date
